description:
Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the island`s caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A la poursuite de Luffy ! Les aventures de Baggy rétréci !
Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy`s Big Adventure!
Mugiwara o Oe! Chiisana Buggy no Daibouken
В погоне за Соломенной шляпой! Большое приключение маленького Багги!
การตามหาลูฟี่! บากี้ตัวตลกกับการผจญภัย!
麦わらを追え! 小さなバギーの大冒険
